entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow *not* generating documentation files for non-externally visible nodes #69872
  • Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #69869
    Backlog

Closed

  • Stop processing during IncrementalValueProvider #69868
  • Perf: OperatorOverloadSyntaxClassifier unnecessarily realizes semantic model for certain nodes #69867

PullRequests

Created

  • Include implicit MyBase.New() call in IBlockOperation for VB Constructors #69873
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, untriaged
  • Fix braces issue fixed locally from last PR but accidentally not pushed before merge #69871
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce work done in operator overload syntax classifier. #69866
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Handle non-member-overriding context in OverrideCompletion #69855
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize `T ?? null` to `T` where `T` is a reference type #69803
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Parameters #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Create a brokered service to delegate loading of projects to us #69857
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Nullable conversion of collection expressions #69852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
